mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def calc_wd_mean_radial(angles_array_deg, axis=1):
    wd_x = np.cos(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)
    wd_y = np.sin(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)
    mean_wd_x = np.mean(wd_x, axis=axis)
    mean_wd_y = np.mean(wd_y, axis=axis)
    mean_angle_rad = np.arctan2(mean_wd_y, mean_wd_x)
    mean_angle_deg = mean_angle_rad * 180.0 / np.pi
    return mean_angle_deg

import numpy as np

def calc_wd_mean_radial(angles_array_deg, axis=-1):
    wd_x = np.cos(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)
    wd_y = np.sin(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)
    mean_wd_x = np.mean(wd_x, axis=axis)
    mean_wd_y = np.mean(wd_y, axis=axis)
    mean_angle_rad = np.arctan2(mean_wd_y, mean_wd_x)
    mean_angle_deg = mean_angle_rad * 180.0 / np.pi
    return mean_angle_deg

import numpy as np

def calc_wd_mean_radial(angles_array_deg, axis=0):
    wd_x = np.cos(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)
    wd_y = np.sin(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)
    mean_wd_x = np.mean(wd_x, axis=axis)
    mean_wd_y = np.mean(wd_y, axis=axis)
    mean_angle_rad = np.arctan2(mean_wd_y, mean_wd_x)
    mean_angle_deg = (mean_angle_rad + 180.0) / np.pi
    return mean_angle_deg

import numpy as np

def calc_wd_mean_radial(angles_array_deg, axis=0):
    wd_x = np.cos(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)
    wd_y = np.sin(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)

import numpy as np

def calc_wd_mean_radial(angles_array_deg, axis=0):
    wd_x = np.cos(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)
    wd_y = np.sin(angles_array_deg * np.pi / 180.0)
    mean_wd_x = np.mean(wd_x, axis=axis)
    mean_wd_y = np.mean(wd_y, axis=axis)
    mean_angle_rad = np.arctan2(mean_wd_y, mean_wd_x)
    mean_angle_deg = mean_angle_rad * -180.0 / np.pi
    return mean_angle_deg
